entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
